question: National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) has partnered with which technology company to provide digital skills to Indian youth?
explanation:
The National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) has partnered with Microsoft, to provide digital skills to more than 1 lakh youth in the country.
Microsoft is set to collaborate with NSDCâ€™s eSkill India portal to conduct digital skilling awareness programmes in the next 12 months. This program is a part of the global skilling initiative carried out across the world by Microsoft.
